headline: How Nucor's (NUE) Low-Carbon Iron Deal With Electra Is Shaping Its Green Steel Narrative
summary: Low-carbon iron startup Electra announced agreements with Nucor and Toyota Tsusho to purchase low-carbon iron produced at a new Colorado demonstration facility, which is planned to be operational in mid-2026 and supported by a US$50 million grant. This move highlights Nucor's commitment to advancing green steel technologies, aligning with broader industry trends toward sustainability and decarbonization in steel production. We'll now explore how Nucor's low-carbon initiative with Electra...

headline: Warren Buffett’s Secret Weapon for 2026
summary: As Warren Buffett prepares to hand over leadership of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-A)(NYSE:BRK-B) to Greg Abel by year’s end, his strategy remains focused on resilience amid market uncertainty. Even in his final months at the helm, Buffett has continued trimming major stakes in Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) and Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), reducing exposure to high-valuation sectors. At ... Warren Buffett’s Secret Weapon for 2026

headline: Jim Cramer on Nucor Stock Action: “Very Impressive”
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently highlighted. Highlighting the pin action that led to the stock’s rally, Cramer commented: “When you get strength in GM, that has tremendous pin action, which is how Nucor, the giant steel maker, could rally nearly 3% today. Again, very impressive.” Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) manufactures […]
